当你击杀玩家或者怪物时，KillReward会向你发送奖励和提示

奖励和提示内容可以配置

提示支持彩色

同时提示有两个变量

奖励数量：{REWARDAMOUNT} 
击杀者名字： {KILLED}


Hello! KillReward is a really simple plugin that will reward your players for killing other players and/or mobs! 
Reward money and message can be configured in the config.yml
Message supports amount and killed players name with {REWARDAMOUNT} and {KILLED}.
 It also supports chat color.


无指令
无权限

要注意以下东西
SNOWMAN = 雪傀儡
WITHER = 凋零 (凋零骷髅属于骷髅)
GUARDIAN = 所有守护者，包括远古守护者
